title: What is the best low-end (<£70) fitness tracker? - Quora

response.answer_text: Flex meets about 75% of the world's demand for wearable activity trackers. Maybe the Fitbit might be a good choice for you.  Wearable technology is providing value to the millions of people using their Fitbit or Misfit activity trackers, but this is just the start of the possibilities for enhancing human intelligence. Flex’s INTELLIGENCE magazine Vol. 1, Issue No.3 examined various wearable technologies.

Fitness is very much important to all of us. We can not able to live  properly if we do not give proper attention to our fitness. For Fitness  tracker I am planning to buy a block, modular smart watch because it provides great modules for fitness.
